title: Digital Tutors  - Being an Effective Animation Supervisor
description:
Throughout this course, we will discuss the various considerations and processes for leading and supervising an animation team. 

These tutorials will discuss the subjects of character continuity, plotting sequences, casting scenes, preparation techniques, group review dynamics, scene review processes, animation feedback methods, and pipeline considerations. 

By the end of this training, you will have many great techniques to utilize as well as an even more thorough understanding of all the elements of leading an animation team on a project.
